Bowman02's point is valid (minus the Pelosi joke, funny, but misplaced).  Lion cubs in essentially the same place and, not exact, but similar condition; it seems implausible that they are not siblings, which raises a valid question about the usefulness of carbon dating.  He did not mention the Bible, so no straw man in the picture.
